description: Hidden BCI messaging function is unlocked under emergency protocol; Council authorizes Nikola to assess its contents for damage control.
Nikola, moved by a recent conversation at the bar about hope and scars, chooses to activate Halden’s poetic message, weaving phrases into citizen data echoes.
Spontaneous circulation of poetic lines in BCI echoes soothes panic, uniting citizens in symbolic defiance and mutual support.
